definition: lit. the soul of a deceased has not yet dispersed (idiom)/fig. the influence still lingers on/the spirit (of some doctrine) is still alive
overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia
surname Yin
soul/spirit/immortal soul, i.e. that can be detached from the body
(negative prefix)/not/no
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: But the noteworthy history still haunts this meeting.
sentences.chinese: 但那段兒著名的歷史仍然“陰魂不散”。

sentences.english: But even from a distance those fumes linger.
sentences.chinese: 就算離開一段距離，這種味道依然陰魂不散。

sentences.english: Long after hope has vanished, these phantom-words remain.
sentences.chinese: 希望破滅許久之後，這些詞句“陰魂不散”。

sentences.english: Therefore, lingering ray, Xiao Shan with the set.
sentences.chinese: 因此，一縷陰魂不散，跟定了肖山。

sentences.english: He did not intend, however, to stick around.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，他不打算陰魂不散。

traitor to one's love/heartless rat
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end

definition: reckless/extremely daring
spendthrift and foolish/sb with more money than sense
to feel guilty as a thief (idiom); to have sth on one's conscience
to have no sense of shame/brazen
to sow dissension (idiom); to drive a wedge between
(coll.) something fishy/shenanigans
ability/skill
lit. spouting smoke through the seven orifices (idiom)/fig. to seethe with anger
shameless
alarm (e.g. burglar or fire alarm)/warning device
lit. chickens flying and dogs jumping (idiom)/fig. in chaos/in disarray
bastard/scoundrel/rogue
